31

August

Crafting Characters for the Stage and Screen

Emma Pierce
Workshop
03:00 PM - 06:00 PM (3h 0m)
C2-605
Read More

Session Details

In this seminar, Dr. Sarah Latham, a career advisor and tech industry veteran, will explore current and emerging career opportunities in the world of technology. Learn how to prepare for the future job market, gain insights into internships, and understand the importance of developing essential tech skills.

Session Details

A fun and interactive workshop designed for beginners, where James Arther will introduce you to the basics of coding. This hands-on experience will provide a fundamental understanding of programming languages like Python, helping you to build simple applications by the end of the session.

Session Details

In this inspiring talk, Emily Carter, a UX/UI designer at a leading tech firm, shares her journey and insights into the world of user experience and interface design. You’ll discover how creativity and innovation shape the digital landscape and learn tips on starting your career in design.

Session Details

In this engaging workshop, Alex Rodriguez, a public speaking coach, will guide you through techniques to improve your speaking and presentation skills. Learn how to structure a talk, connect with your audience, and present with confidence in academic and professional settings.

Session Details

University life can be exciting and challenging. In this panel discussion led by Dr. Karen Williams, mental health experts and students will share strategies for maintaining mental well-being during your studies. Topics include stress management, work-life balance, and building a supportive community.

Session Details

In this seminar, Dr. Anthony Miller, a professor of business and entrepreneurship, will guide you through the journey of starting a business, from idea generation to scaling. Learn about key business strategies, entrepreneurship mindset, and how to turn your passion into a successful venture in today’s competitive market.

Session Details

In this dynamic workshop, renowned actress Emma Pierce will take you behind the scenes of character development for both stage and screen. Learn acting techniques, explore the emotional depth of characters, and discover the art of storytelling through performance. Whether you’re aspiring to be on stage or in front of the camera, this session will help you sharpen your skills and ignite your passion for acting.
